Frequently Asked Questions

How do I become a vendor on StreetDeli Explorer?
To become a vendor, simply click on the "Register as Vendor" button on our homepage and fill out the application form. Our team will review your application and get back to you within 2-3 business days.
What are the commission rates for vendors?
Our commission rates vary based on your subscription plan. Basic plans start at 15% per transaction, while premium plans offer rates as low as 10%. Contact our sales team for detailed pricing information.
How do I update my menu or business information?
You can update your menu and business information directly from your vendor dashboard. Simply log in, navigate to the "My Menu" or "Profile" section, and make the necessary changes.
What payment methods are supported?
We support various payment methods including credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and popular digital wallets like Touch 'n Go eWallet and GrabPay.
How can I track my business performance?
Our analytics dashboard provides detailed insights into your business performance. You can track orders, revenue, customer reviews, and other key metrics in real-time.
